entry.title: New release for Wiredoor: v1.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add ttl parameter to temporary service exposures using wiredoor cli by @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/42
  • Redirect to oauth2 provider by defaultRedirect to oauth2 provider by default by @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/43
  • Try to refresh DNS cache making a ping if first resolution intent fails @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/51
  • Await for gateway routing initialization at startup @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/51
  • update multer to fix CVE-2025-48997 by @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/52
  • Fix trivial typo - update README.md by @saraf in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/53
  • Escape environment variables by @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/58
  • Publish tag version as tags to GHCR by @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/58

New Contributors

  • @saraf made their first contribution in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/53

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/compare/v1.1.1...v1.2.0

entry.title: New release for Wiredoor: v1.3.0
entry.content:
NGINX + WireGuard Monitoring Now Available ðŸš€

New Features

This release introduces native monitoring support for both NGINX and WireGuard within the Wiredoor platform. Gain full visibility into your HTTP and VPN traffic in real time using Prometheus and Grafana.

Nginx Monitoring

  • Exposes real-time metrics using the stub_status module.
  • Integrates with Prometheus via fluentbit
  • Pre-built Grafana dashboard included: see active connections, traffic patterns, and request rates at a glance.

WireGuard Monitoring

  • Exports metrics such as traffic per node, last handshake, and connection status.
  • Optimized metrics collection to reduce overhead.

How to enable

Check out the updated documentation here: Monitoring Setup Guide

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/compare/v1.2.3...v1.3.0
